Package it.polimi.vovarini.model.godcards.deciders

Class BuildabilityDecider

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.vovarini.model.godcards.deciders.Decider
it.polimi.vovarini.model.godcards.deciders.BuildabilityDecider
public class BuildabilityDecider
extends Decider
BuildabilityDecider is an extension of Decider. It decides what boxes the player can build upon
Since:
1.0

    BuildabilityDecider()

    static boolean buildOnSameTarget​(GameDataAccessor gameData, Point target)

    static boolean mustBuildDomes​(GameDataAccessor gameData, Point target)
    This method adds a Construction Constraint, making the opponent's workers able to build only a dome to complete a tower if they try to build in a position adjacent to one of the workers possessed by the owner of the Limus GodCard.

  • Constructor Details

    • BuildabilityDecider

      public BuildabilityDecider()

  • Method Details

    • denyPreviousTarget

      public static boolean denyPreviousTarget​(GameDataAccessor gameData, Point target)
      This method is a constraint applied to a Construction the player wants to perform after a previous one. It denies the opportunity to build on the same target you just built upon.
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the gameData all players are currently playing
      target - is the box, represented by his point coordinates, where I want to build
      Returns:
      false if the chosen target is equal to the one of the previous construction, true otherwise

    • buildOnSameTarget

      public static boolean buildOnSameTarget​(GameDataAccessor gameData, Point target)
      This method is a constraint applied to a Construction the player wants to perform after a previous one. It denies the opportunity to build in any other target different than the first one chosen
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the gameData all players are currently playing
      target - is the box, represented by his point coordinates, where I want to build
      Returns:
      true if the chosen target is equal to the one of the previous construction, false otherwise

    • denyPerimeterSpace

      public static boolean denyPerimeterSpace​(GameDataAccessor gameData, Point target)
      This method is a constraint applied to a Construction the player wants to perform after a previous one. It denies the opportunity to build on a perimeter space.
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the gameData all players are currently playing
      target - is the box, represented by his point coordinates, where I want to build
      Returns:
      false if the chosen target is a perimeter space, true otherwise

    • buildUnderMyself

      public static boolean buildUnderMyself​(GameDataAccessor gameData, Point target)
      This method adds a construction condition, making the worker able to build a block under itself (not a dome)
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the gameData all players are currently playing
      target - is the box, represented by his point coordinates, where I want to build
      Returns:
      true if the chosen target is the current worker position and target's level is less than 3, false otherwise

    • mustBuildDomes

      public static boolean mustBuildDomes​(GameDataAccessor gameData, Point target)
      This method adds a Construction Constraint, making the opponent's workers able to build only a dome to complete a tower if they try to build in a position adjacent to one of the workers possessed by the owner of the Limus GodCard.
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the Data of the game all players are currently playing
      target - is the position in the board where the player wants to build
      Returns:
      true if the point is not adjacent to one of the workers of Limus' owner or if it is adjacent, but you can build a complete tower. False otherwise.
